title: Spartacus: House of Ashur
overview: In a world where he survived the events of Spartacus (2010), Ashur clawed his way to power, owning the same ludus that once owned him. Allying with a fierce gladiatrix, Ashur ignites a new kind of spectacle that offends the elite.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, amid a spate of unexplained disappearances of local children, a group of misfit friends begin to suspect a long-buried ancient evil lurking. As the kids set out to determine what's really going on, a rising unease prompts several townspeople to work together to restore peace – all while a U.S. military operation seeks to exploit Derry for its own objectives.
reason: A highly anticipated HBO series with an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 71,000 votes and an 8.2 TMDB score. It benefits from the popular 'IT' franchise and the involvement of director Andy Muschietti.

title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Critically acclaimed with an 87 Metacritic score and an 8.1 IMDb rating from over 76,000 votes. Created by 'Breaking Bad' mastermind Vince Gilligan and starring Rhea Seehorn, it's a highly anticipated Apple TV series.

title: Man vs Baby
overview: As Christmas approaches, a blundering-all-the-way dad juggles housesitting a posh London penthouse with an unexpected pickle: caring for a lost baby.

title: The Last Frontier
overview: When a prison transport plane crashes in the remote Alaskan wilderness—freeing dozens of violent inmates—the region's lone marshal must protect the town he's vowed to keep safe.

title: The Beast in Me
overview: A famous author is pulled into a twisted mind game with her rich, powerful new neighbor — who might be a murderer.

title: Task
overview: In the working-class suburbs of Philadelphia, an FBI agent heads a task force assembled to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.
reason: An HBO crime drama boasting an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 45,000 votes and a strong 77 Metacritic score. It features A-list actor Mark Ruffalo and is created by Brad Ingelsby ('Mare of Easttown').

title: Black Rabbit
overview: A rising-star restaurateur is forced into New York's criminal underworld when his chaotic brother returns to town with loan sharks on his trail.
reason: A Netflix drama with a 7.4 IMDb rating from over 35,000 votes, featuring a star-studded cast including Jason Bateman and Jude Law, whose production companies are also involved.

title: Boots
overview: After impulsively joining the U.S. Marine Corps, a bullied teen finds new purpose — and unexpected brotherhood — with his motley team of fellow recruits.

title: Wayward
overview: A small-town cop suspects that the local school for troubled teens — and its dangerously charismatic founder — may not be all it seems.

title: House of Guinness
overview: Dublin, 1868. The Guinness family patriarch is dead, and his four children — each with dark secrets to hide — hold the brewery's fate in their hands.
